companyInfo.name: Campfire
companyInfo.industry: Accounting software for high-growth tech companies

implementation.useCase: Campfire integrated Claude into their accounting software platform to automate complex accounting tasks including invoicing, billing, revenue accounting, financial statements, and AI-powered conversational reporting. They created Ember AI, a chat interface that enables natural language queries of financial data, audit support, and flux analyses with detailed commentary.
implementation.problem: Traditional accounting software had reached its limits with rule-based automation, leaving accounting teams bogged down by manual tasks. Accounting professionals needed to reduce time spent on tedious work while maintaining accuracy and auditability.
implementation.integrationMethod: Campfire leveraged Claude's financial 'recipes' API framework for rapid deployment, using Anthropic's 'cookbook' to build AI into their product.

qualitativeBenefits.detail: Shifting accountants from number-crunchers to strategic advisors
qualitativeBenefits.sourceText: By automating routine and repetitive aspects of accounting work, Campfire aims to transform accountants from number-crunchers to strategic advisors focused on driving business growth and making high-impact financial decisions.

technicalDetails.architecture: Claude powers Ember AI chat interface that enables natural language queries of financial data, audit support, and flux analyses with detailed commentary. The system also includes automated bank reconciliation that parses bank statements and identifies discrepancies, and intelligent data integration that merges external data with Campfire records.
technicalDetails.promptEngineering: Campfire leveraged Anthropic's 'cookbook' and financial 'recipes' API framework to build AI into their product
technicalDetails.solutions: Campfire prioritized AI projects based on usage data and time spent in their software to maximize customer impact
